response.original_title: Red in the Centre: Looking for the H Chord
response.overview: In his third book and second documentary, Monte Dwyer sets out across Australia to look for the mystical H Chord, discovered missing during a jam session in 2010. While the search proves to be fruitless, the journey proves to be fruitful as he encounters all sorts of characters from Maralinga to the Kimberley and Arnhem Land.
response.title: Red in the Centre: Looking for the H Chord
